Name: Push The Blocks
About the game: Push The Blocks is a game for puzzle lovers. Each level is a maze that must be crossed by the main block until it reaches the 'X'. Along the way, you can push auxiliary blocks, the colored blocks, which will help you accomplish the goal. Features: 35 levels carefully designed for you to exercise your logical thinking; Multiple puzzle mechanics; Some levels can be solved in multiple ways. Others with just one; Relaxing music. Show yourself that you are a true puzzle master in this fun and challenging game! Credits: Game Designer: Saulo Lira (saulo.l.nascimento@hotmail.com) Programmer: Jo√£o Victor (kaijota.itch.io) Cover Art: Rick Bastos (artstation.com/rickbastos) Background Music: Gamaliwa (bensmir.itch.io)
